```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600
library(shiny)
library(bslib)

beaver_data <- datasets::beaver2
# Define UI for app that draws a histogram ----
ui <- page_sidebar(
  sidebar = sidebar(open = "open",
                    selectInput("dataframe_column",
                                label = "Choose Column",
                                choices = list("day",
                                               "time",
                                               "temp",
                                               "activ"),
                                selected = "day")
  ),
  plotOutput("plot", width=1100)
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  data <- reactive({
    tmp <- beaver_data %>% select(input$dataframe_column)
    return(tmp)
  })
  
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    hist(data()
  )
   
  }, res=140)
}

# Create Shiny app ----
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
